title: Inside the ECB, Irritation Grows Over Lagarde’s Handling of Exit
description: Confused, irritated, uncertain. Inside the European Central Bank, staff are in shock by reports that President Christine Lagarde will quit before her term is up, leaving questions about her authority.
content: Confused, irritated, uncertain. Inside the European Central Bank, staff are in shock by reports that President Christine Lagarde will quit before her term is up, leaving questions about her authority.
